entry.title: [GLOBAL][ManagedKubernetesService] - Nodes underlying OS LTS update
entry.content:

Apr 7, 10:16 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 13/06/2023 08:30 UTC
End time : 15/06/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our services, we will upgrade our public cloud nodes underlying OS from Ubuntu 18.04 LTS to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS.
